name: Onomatopia
text: Each time a "Utopia" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your side of the field, place 1 Hi-Five the Sky Counter on this card. All monsters you control gain 200 ATK and DEF for each Hi-Five the Sky Counter on this card. Once per turn: You can remove 2 Hi-Five the Sky Counters from this card; Special Summon 1 "Zubaba", "Gagaga", "Gogogo", or "Dododo" monster from your Deck.
